# If

```{lisp}
;;(if (predicate)
;;    (do this if true...)
;;  (do this if false...))

(if (TRUE)
    (print "This is true")
  (print "This is false")) ;; will always print "This is true"

;; use progn for multiline statements
(if (TRUE)
    (progn
      (print "Test1")
      (print "Test2"))
  (print "No tests"))
;; this prints Test 1 then Test 2 and returns Test2
```
